item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
116 Crown
New Haven, CT 06511
203-777-3116
Owner/Manager-John

Come join the NHC at New Haven's newest hip bar, 116 Crown. They are normally closed on Mondays, however; with a promise of a minimum of 40 attendees, they will open just for us. Yay for NHC!!!


Specialty Cocktails:
The New Black - 9 (reg. price $12)
Church Key - 9 (reg. price $12)
Thom Collins & Elderflower Collins - 6 (reg. price $8)
Cachaca Mojito - 6 (reg. price $8)


Food:
Vegetable Tempura
Bresaola & Tomato Jam Finger Sandwiches
Cheese, Bread & Olive Platter
Chocolate Chip & Espresso Cookies
Stay tuned-Will Update Soon!


Contact is Robyn-Allise: 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour-116 Crown...Just for NHC (and Friends)
